verses.content: Chun, zâwlneihai, Haggai le Iddo naupa Zekaria chun Juda ram le Jerusalema Juda umhai kuoma chun thu an hrillâwk a; Israel Pathien hmingin a nih anni chun thu an hrillâwk chu.
Chun, Sealtiel naupa Zerubbabel le Jozadak naupa Jesua chu an tho a, Jerusalema um, Pathien in chu an bâwl ṭan tah a; chun, an kuoma chun Pathien zâwlneihai chu anni ṭhang- puiin an um bawk a.
Chu hun lai chun vadung râl tieng rorêltu Tattenai le Sethar- bozenai le an ruolhai chu an kuomah an hung a, an kuomah, “Hi in bâwl ding le, kul hi siemzo dingin tuin am thu a pêk cheu a?” an ta.
Chun, an kuoma chun hieng ang hin thu kan hril a, “Hi in bâwltuhai hi an hming ieng am a na?” tiin.
Nisienlakhawm, an Pathien mit chu Juda upahai chunga chun a fuh a, chu thu chu Daria kuom a tlung a, a chungthua dawnna lekha chu a hung tlung hmakhat chun anni chu an suktâwp ta nawh a.
Vadung râltieng rorêltu Tattenai le Sethar-bozenai le a ruolhai Aphar- sak mihai, vadung râltienga umhai- in lal Daria lekhathawn an inphur chu:
a kuoma chun lekhathawn an inphur a, chutaka chun hieng anga ziek hi a nih: “Lal Daria kuomah, inremna po po um raw se.

Juda ram bielah, Pathien in ropuitaka chun kan feh a, chu chu lung ropuitakhaia bâwl a na, a banghai chu thinga siem a na; chun, sin chu taimataka thaw pei a na, an kuta chun a hung hlawtling hle el a nih ti hi lal chun lo hre raw se.
Chun, chuong upahai chu, ‘Hi in bâwl ding le kul hi siemzo dingin tuin am thu a pêk cheu a?’ tiin kan in- dawn a.
Hung hrilfie ding chein, anni laia lua um mihai hminghai chu kan hung ziek theina dingin, an hminghai khawm kan indawn bawk a.
Chun, anni chun hieng ang hin an mi dawn a, ‘Hnuoi le vân Pathien siehlawhai kan na, Israel lal ropui- takin a lo bâwl zo tah, hi kum tam- taka lo bâwl tah in hi kan bâwl a nih.

Nisienlakhawm, chu hnunga chun kan thlatuhai chun vân Pathien chu an lo suklungsen a, ama chun Kaldai mi, Babulon lal, Nebukadnez- zar, hi in hi suksea, mihai chu Babulon tienga ṭhuoi sâwngtu kuta chun a pêk tah a.
Nisienlakhawm, Babulon lal Kura inlal kum khatnaa chun, lal Kura chun hi Pathien in hi bâwlna dingin thupêk chu a siem ta a nih.

Chun, rângkachak le tangka- raw bûr le bêlhai Nebukadnezzarin Jerusalem biekina inthawka a lâk a, Babulon biekina a hung lâkhai chu, chuonghai ngei chu lal Kura chun Babulon biekina inthawk chun a lâk suok a, mi pakhat a hming Sesbazzar, amain rorêltua a siem ngei kuoma chun chuong chu a pêk a nih;
ama kuoma chun, Hieng bûr le bêlhai hi la la, fe la, Jerusalema um biekina chun sie rawh; chun, Pathien in chu a hmun ngaia ngei bâwl ni raw se, a tih a.
Chun, chu Sesbazzar bawk chu a hung a, Jerusalema um Pathien in lungphûm a phûm tah a; chutaka inthawk tah tu chen hin bâwl a ni ta zing a, zo fel lo a la ni zing a nih,’ tiin.

Chuleiin, tuhin lalin ṭha a ti zâwng a ni chun chu Babulona lal sum inah zawng ni sienla, Jerusa- lema Pathien in hi bâwlna dingin lal Kura chun thupêk a lo siem ta chun chutaka chun a um âwm sih a; chun, lal chun hi thu chungchânga hin ṭha a ti zâwng chu mi hung hril bawk raw se,” tiin.
